summary: This document is a declaration by Toni LaManna, the custodian of records for American Express, in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena issued by Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey. It certifies the authenticity of records provided in compliance with the subpoena, affirming that they were created in the regular course of business.

persons.name: Toni LaManna
persons.context: Toni LaManna declares the authenticity of records in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Maurene Comey signed the Grand Jury Subpoena requesting records from American Express.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued requesting records from American Express.

keyFacts: Toni LaManna is the custodian of records for American Express.
The declaration certifies the authenticity of records provided in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.
The subpoena was issued by Assistant United States Attorney Maurene Comey.
The records were made in the regular course of business.
The declaration was executed on January 9, 2020.
